akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1300h. Omitted Editorial Notes Codification Section, Pub. L. 100–420, § 2, Sept. 8, 1988, 102 Stat. 1577, which set out congressional findings, was omitted from the Code as being of special and not general application.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short TitlePub. L. 100–420, § 1, Sept. 8, 1988, 102 Stat. 1577, provided that Pub. L. 100–420, enacting this subchapter, could be cited as the “Lac Vieux Desert Band of Lake Superior Chippewa Indians Act”.
